item.title: Dear Diary
item.description: Personal sites are a complicated matter. How do you authentically project your personality into a 2d digital space? This site has gone through nearly as many iterations as I have, which is to say, a lot. Every personal site has two experiences: the one the public interacts with, and the one you interact with when you manage the site’s content. If that interface feels like an I-have-to-sit-down-and-make-an-update type event, then you probably just won’t.
